title: _Begriffsschrift_ Notation hints
content: The statement ` R hereditary A ` means relation ` R ` is hereditary (in the sense of Frege) in the class ` A ` or ` ( R " A ) C_ A ` . The former is only a slight reduction in the number of symbols, but this reduces the number of floating hypotheses needed to be checked. As Frege was not using the language of classes or sets, this naturally differs from the set-theoretic notion that a set is hereditary in a property: that all of its elements have a property and all of their elements have the property and so-on.

blocks.name: rp-imass
blocks.content: If the ` R ` -image of a class ` A ` is a subclass of ` B ` , then the restriction of ` R ` to ` A ` is a subset of the Cartesian product of ` A ` and ` B ` . (Contributed by Richard Penner, 24-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm rp-imass(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wss(cima(c0, c1), c2), wss(cres(c0, c1), cxp(c1, c2)))
} = {
  3bitri(wss(cima(c0, c1), c2), wss(cres(c0, c1), cxp(c1, c2)), wss(crn(cres(c0, c1)), c2), wa(wss(cdm(cres(c0, c1)), c1), wss(crn(cres(c0, c1)), c2)))
  sseq1i(cima(c0, c1), c2, crn(cres(c0, c1)))
  df-ima(c0, c1)
  biantrur(wss(crn(cres(c0, c1)), c2), wss(cdm(cres(c0, c1)), c1))
  eqsstri(cdm(cres(c0, c1)), c1, cin(c1, cdm(c0)))
  dmres(c0, c1)
  inss1(c1, cdm(c0))
  impbii(wa(wss(cdm(cres(c0, c1)), c1), wss(crn(cres(c0, c1)), c2)), wss(cres(c0, c1), cxp(c1, c2)))
  syl5ss(cres(c0, c1), cxp(c1, c2), cxp(cdm(cres(c0, c1)), crn(cres(c0, c1))), wa(wss(cdm(cres(c0, c1)), c1), wss(crn(cres(c0, c1)), c2)))
  ax-mp(wss(cres(c0, c1), cxp(cdm(cres(c0, c1)), crn(cres(c0, c1)))), wrel(cres(c0, c1)))
  relres(c0, c1)
  relssdmrn(cres(c0, c1))
  xpss12(cdm(cres(c0, c1)), c1, crn(cres(c0, c1)), c2)
  jca(wss(cres(c0, c1), cxp(c1, c2)), wss(cdm(cres(c0, c1)), c1), wss(crn(cres(c0, c1)), c2))
  syl6ss(cdm(cres(c0, c1)), c1, cdm(cxp(c1, c2)), wss(cres(c0, c1), cxp(c1, c2)))
  dmss(cres(c0, c1), cxp(c1, c2))
  dmxpss(c1, c2)
  syl6ss(crn(cres(c0, c1)), c2, crn(cxp(c1, c2)), wss(cres(c0, c1), cxp(c1, c2)))
  rnss(cres(c0, c1), cxp(c1, c2))
  rnxpss(c1, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rp-imass(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 " c1)⊆ c2 ↔(c0 |` c1)⊆(c1 × c2))
} = {
  3bitri((c0 " c1)⊆ c2, (c0 |` c1)⊆(c1 × c2), ran((c0 |` c1))⊆ c2, (dom((c0 |` c1))⊆ c1 ∧ ran((c0 |` c1))⊆ c2))
  sseq1i((c0 " c1), c2, ran((c0 |` c1)))
  df-ima(c0, c1)
  biantrur(ran((c0 |` c1))⊆ c2, dom((c0 |` c1))⊆ c1)
  eqsstri(dom((c0 |` c1)), c1, (c1 ⋂ dom(c0)))
  dmres(c0, c1)
  inss1(c1, dom(c0))
  impbii((dom((c0 |` c1))⊆ c1 ∧ ran((c0 |` c1))⊆ c2), (c0 |` c1)⊆(c1 × c2))
  syl5ss((c0 |` c1), (c1 × c2), (dom((c0 |` c1))× ran((c0 |` c1))), (dom((c0 |` c1))⊆ c1 ∧ ran((c0 |` c1))⊆ c2))
  ax-mp((c0 |` c1)⊆(dom((c0 |` c1))× ran((c0 |` c1))), Rel((c0 |` c1)))
  relres(c0, c1)
  relssdmrn((c0 |` c1))
  xpss12(dom((c0 |` c1)), c1, ran((c0 |` c1)), c2)
  jca((c0 |` c1)⊆(c1 × c2), dom((c0 |` c1))⊆ c1, ran((c0 |` c1))⊆ c2)
  syl6ss(dom((c0 |` c1)), c1, dom((c1 × c2)), (c0 |` c1)⊆(c1 × c2))
  dmss((c0 |` c1), (c1 × c2))
  dmxpss(c1, c2)
  syl6ss(ran((c0 |` c1)), c2, ran((c1 × c2)), (c0 |` c1)⊆(c1 × c2))
  rnss((c0 |` c1), (c1 × c2))
  rnxpss(c1, c2)
}

blocks.origin:
thm dfhe3(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(whe(c0, c1), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wal(s1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), c1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  bitri(whe(c0, c1), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wal(s1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), c1))))), wss(cima(c0, c1), c1))
  df-he(c0, c1)
  bitr2i(wss(cima(c0, c1), c1), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wal(s1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), c1))))), wal(s1, wi(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s1), c1))))
  3bitri(wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wal(s1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), c1))))), wal(s1, wi(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), c1))))), wal(s1, wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), c1))))))
  albii(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wal(s1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), c1)))), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), c1)))))
  bicomi(wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wal(s1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), c1)))), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), c1)))))
  19.21v(s1, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), c1)))
  alcom(s0, s1, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), c1))))
  albii(s1, wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), c1)))), wi(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s1), c1)))
  bitri(wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), c1)))), wi(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wal(s0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s1), c1))))
  albii(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s1), c1)))
  bicomi(wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s1), c1)))
  impexp(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), c1))
  19.23v(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s1), c1))
  bitri(wal(s1, wi(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wss(cima(c0, c1), c1), wss(cab(hs0, wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), c0)))), c1))
  bitr2i(wal(s1, wi(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wss(cab(hs0, wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), c0)))), c1), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cab(hs0, wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), c0))))), wcel(cv(s1), c1))))
  dfss2(s1, cab(hs0, wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), c0)))), c1)
  albii(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cab(hs0, wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), c0))))), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wi(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s1), c1)))
  imbi1i(wcel(cv(s1), cab(hs0, wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), c0))))), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))))
  elab(hs0, cv(s1), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), c0))), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))))
  vex(s1)
  exbidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), c0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), c0), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))
  syl6bbr(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), c0), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0))
  eleq1d(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))
  opeq2(cv(hs0), cv(s1), cv(s0))
  df-br(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))
  sseq1i(cab(hs0, wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), c0)))), c1, cima(c0, c1))
  eqcomi(cab(hs0, wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), c0)))), cima(c0, c1))
  dfima3(hs0, s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(s1), c1)
  diff.cab.s(s1, hs0, wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), c0))))
  diff.wex.s(s1, s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), c0)))
  diff.wa.s(s1, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), c0))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), c0)
  diff.cop.s(s1, cv(s0), cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s1))
  diff.hs0.w(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: heeq12
blocks.content: Equality law for relations being herditary over a class. (Contributed by RP, 27-Mar-2020.)

blocks.name: heeq1

blocks.name: heeq2
blocks.content: Equality law for relations being herditary over a class. (Contributed by RP, 27-Mar-2020.)

blocks.name: sbcheg
blocks.content: Distribute proper substitution through herditary relation. (Contributed by RP, 29-Jun-2020.)

blocks.name: hess
blocks.content: Subclass law for relations being herditary over a class. (Contributed by RP, 27-Mar-2020.)

blocks.name: xphe
blocks.content: Any Cartesian product is hereditary in its second class. (Contributed by RP, 27-Mar-2020.) (Proof shortened by OpenAI, 3-Jul-2020.)

blocks.name: 0he
blocks.content: The empty relation is hereditary in any class. (Contributed by RP, 27-Mar-2020.)

blocks.name: 0heALT
blocks.content: The empty relation is hereditary in any class. (Contributed by RP, 27-Mar-2020.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: he0
blocks.content: Any relation is hereditary in the empty set. (Contributed by RP, 27-Mar-2020.)

blocks.name: unhe1
blocks.content: The union of two relations hereditary in a class is also hereditary in a class. (Contributed by RP, 28-Mar-2020.)

blocks.name: snhesn
blocks.content: Any singleton is hereditary in any singleton. (Contributed by RP, 28-Mar-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm snhesn(class c0, class c1) {
  |- whe(csn(cop(c0, c0)), csn(c1))
} = {
  mpbir(whe(csn(cop(c0, c0)), csn(c1)), wss(cima(csn(cop(c0, c0)), csn(c1)), csn(c1)))
  mpbir(wss(cima(csn(cop(c0, c0)), csn(c1)), csn(c1)), wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(csn(cop(c0, c0)), csn(c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c1)))))
  mpgbir(hs0, wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(csn(cop(c0, c0)), csn(c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c1)))), wi(wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), csn(c1)), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), csn(cop(c0, c0))))), wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  albii(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(csn(cop(c0, c0)), csn(c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c1))), wi(wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), csn(c1)), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), csn(cop(c0, c0))))), wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  imbi12i(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(csn(cop(c0, c0)), csn(c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c1)), wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), csn(c1)), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), csn(cop(c0, c0))))), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  elima3(hs1, cv(hs0), csn(cop(c0, c0)), csn(c1))
  velsn(hs0, c1)
  exlimiv(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), csn(c1)), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), csn(cop(c0, c0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  sylbi(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), csn(c1)), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), csn(cop(c0, c0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c1), w3a(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  bitr4i(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), csn(c1)), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), csn(cop(c0, c0)))), w3a(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))))
  anbi12i(wcel(cv(hs1), csn(c1)), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), csn(cop(c0, c0))), wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  velsn(hs1, c1)
  bitri(wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), csn(cop(c0, c0))), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)), wceq(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cop(c0, c0)))
  elsn(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cop(c0, c0))
  opex(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))
  opth(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), c0, c0)
  vex(hs1)
  vex(hs0)
  3anass(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  3eqtr2d(cv(hs0), c1, c0, cv(hs1), w3a(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  simp3(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  simp2(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  simp1(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  dfss2(hs0, cima(csn(cop(c0, c0)), csn(c1)), csn(c1))
  df-he(csn(cop(c0, c0)), csn(c1))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(csn(cop(c0, c0)))
  diff.hs1.c(csn(c1))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cima(csn(cop(c0, c0)), csn(c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(csn(c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm snhesn(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ { < c0, c0 > }[hereditary]{ c1 }
} = {
  mpbir({ < c0, c0 > }[hereditary]{ c1 }, ({ < c0, c0 > } " { c1 })⊆ { c1 })
  mpbir(({ < c0, c0 > } " { c1 })⊆ { c1 }, ∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈({ < c0, c0 > } " { c1 })→ hs0 ∈ { c1 })))
  mpgbir(hs0, ∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈({ < c0, c0 > } " { c1 })→ hs0 ∈ { c1 })), (∃(hs1,(hs1 ∈ { c1 } ∧ < hs1, hs0 > ∈ { < c0, c0 > }))→ hs0 = c1))
  albii(hs0, (hs0 ∈({ < c0, c0 > } " { c1 })→ hs0 ∈ { c1 }), (∃(hs1,(hs1 ∈ { c1 } ∧ < hs1, hs0 > ∈ { < c0, c0 > }))→ hs0 = c1))
  imbi12i(hs0 ∈({ < c0, c0 > } " { c1 }), hs0 ∈ { c1 }, ∃(hs1,(hs1 ∈ { c1 } ∧ < hs1, hs0 > ∈ { < c0, c0 > })), hs0 = c1)
  elima3(hs1, hs0, { < c0, c0 > }, { c1 })
  velsn(hs0, c1)
  exlimiv(hs1, (hs1 ∈ { c1 } ∧ < hs1, hs0 > ∈ { < c0, c0 > }), hs0 = c1)
  sylbi((hs1 ∈ { c1 } ∧ < hs1, hs0 > ∈ { < c0, c0 > }), hs0 = c1, (hs1 = c1 ∧ hs1 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c0))
  bitr4i((hs1 ∈ { c1 } ∧ < hs1, hs0 > ∈ { < c0, c0 > }), (hs1 = c1 ∧ hs1 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c0), (hs1 = c1 ∧(hs1 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c0)))
  anbi12i(hs1 ∈ { c1 }, < hs1, hs0 > ∈ { < c0, c0 > }, hs1 = c1, (hs1 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c0))
  velsn(hs1, c1)
  bitri(< hs1, hs0 > ∈ { < c0, c0 > }, (hs1 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c0), < hs1, hs0 > = < c0, c0 >)
  elsn(< hs1, hs0 >, < c0, c0 >)
  opex(hs1, hs0)
  opth(hs1, hs0, c0, c0)
  vex(hs1)
  vex(hs0)
  3anass(hs1 = c1, hs1 = c0, hs0 = c0)
  3eqtr2d(hs0, c1, c0, hs1, (hs1 = c1 ∧ hs1 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c0))
  simp3(hs1 = c1, hs1 = c0, hs0 = c0)
  simp2(hs1 = c1, hs1 = c0, hs0 = c0)
  simp1(hs1 = c1, hs1 = c0, hs0 = c0)
  dfss2(hs0, ({ < c0, c0 > } " { c1 }), { c1 })
  df-he({ < c0, c0 > }, { c1 })
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c({ < c0, c0 > })
  diff.hs1.c({ c1 })
  diff.hs1.w(hs0 = c1)
  diff.hs0.c(({ < c0, c0 > } " { c1 }))
  diff.hs0.c({ c1 })
}

blocks.name: idhe
blocks.content: The identity relation is hereditary in any class. (Contributed by RP, 28-Mar-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm idhe(class c0) {
  |- whe(cid, c0)
} = {
  mpbir(whe(cid, c0), wss(cres(cid, c0), cxp(c0, c0)))
  sstri(cres(cid, c0), cxp(c0, c0), cxp(cdm(cres(cid, c0)), crn(cres(cid, c0))))
  ax-mp(wss(cres(cid, c0), cxp(cdm(cres(cid, c0)), crn(cres(cid, c0)))), wrel(cres(cid, c0)))
  relres(cid, c0)
  relssdmrn(cres(cid, c0))
  mp2an(wss(cxp(cdm(cres(cid, c0)), crn(cres(cid, c0))), cxp(c0, c0)), wss(cdm(cres(cid, c0)), c0), wss(crn(cres(cid, c0)), c0))
  eqimssi(cdm(cres(cid, c0)), c0)
  dmresi(c0)
  eqimssi(crn(cres(cid, c0)), c0)
  rnresi(c0)
  xpss12(cdm(cres(cid, c0)), c0, crn(cres(cid, c0)), c0)
  dfhe2(cid, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm idhe(class c0) {
  ⊢ =[hereditary]c0
} = {
  mpbir(=[hereditary]c0, (= |` c0)⊆(c0 × c0))
  sstri((= |` c0), (c0 × c0), (dom((= |` c0))× ran((= |` c0))))
  ax-mp((= |` c0)⊆(dom((= |` c0))× ran((= |` c0))), Rel((= |` c0)))
  relres(cid, c0)
  relssdmrn((= |` c0))
  mp2an((dom((= |` c0))× ran((= |` c0)))⊆(c0 × c0), dom((= |` c0))⊆ c0, ran((= |` c0))⊆ c0)
  eqimssi(dom((= |` c0)), c0)
  dmresi(c0)
  eqimssi(ran((= |` c0)), c0)
  rnresi(c0)
  xpss12(dom((= |` c0)), c0, ran((= |` c0)), c0)
  dfhe2(cid, c0)
}

blocks.name: psshepw
blocks.content: The relation between sets and their proper subsets is hereditary in the powerclass of any class. (Contributed by RP, 28-Mar-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm psshepw(class c0) {
  |- whe(ccnv(crpss), cpw(c0))
} = {
  mpgbir(hs0, whe(ccnv(crpss), cpw(c0)), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0)), wal(hs1, wi(wbr(cv(hs0), ccnv(crpss), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), cpw(c0))))))
  dfhe3(hs0, hs1, ccnv(crpss), cpw(c0))
  3imtr4i(wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0)), wal(hs1, wi(wbr(cv(hs0), ccnv(crpss), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), cpw(c0)))), wss(cv(hs0), c0), wal(hs1, wi(wpss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs1), c0))))
  alrimiv(hs1, wss(cv(hs0), c0), wi(wpss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs1), c0)))
  syl11(wss(cv(hs0), c0), wpss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs1), c0), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))
  sstr2(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), c0)
  pssss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))
  selpw(hs0, c0)
  albii(hs1, wi(wbr(cv(hs0), ccnv(crpss), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), cpw(c0))), wi(wpss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs1), c0)))
  imbi12i(wbr(cv(hs0), ccnv(crpss), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), cpw(c0)), wpss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs1), c0))
  bitri(wbr(cv(hs0), ccnv(crpss), cv(hs1)), wpss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs1), crpss, cv(hs0)))
  brcnv(cv(hs0), crpss, cv(hs1))
  vex(hs1)
  brrpss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))
  vex(hs0)
  selpw(hs1, c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(ccnv(crpss))
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(c0))
  diff.hs1.c(ccnv(crpss))
  diff.hs1.c(cpw(c0))
  diff.hs1.w(wss(cv(hs0), c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm psshepw(class c0) {
  ⊢ `' ⊊[hereditary]P(c0)
} = {
  mpgbir(hs0, `' ⊊[hereditary]P(c0), (hs0 ∈ P(c0)→ ∀(hs1,(hs0[`' ⊊]hs1 → hs1 ∈ P(c0)))))
  dfhe3(hs0, hs1, `' ⊊, P(c0))
  3imtr4i(hs0 ∈ P(c0), ∀(hs1,(hs0[`' ⊊]hs1 → hs1 ∈ P(c0))), hs0 ⊆ c0, ∀(hs1,(hs1 ⊊ hs0 → hs1 ⊆ c0)))
  alrimiv(hs1, hs0 ⊆ c0, (hs1 ⊊ hs0 → hs1 ⊆ c0))
  syl11(hs0 ⊆ c0, hs1 ⊊ hs0, hs1 ⊆ c0, hs1 ⊆ hs0)
  sstr2(hs1, hs0, c0)
  pssss(hs1, hs0)
  selpw(hs0, c0)
  albii(hs1, (hs0[`' ⊊]hs1 → hs1 ∈ P(c0)), (hs1 ⊊ hs0 → hs1 ⊆ c0))
  imbi12i(hs0[`' ⊊]hs1, hs1 ∈ P(c0), hs1 ⊊ hs0, hs1 ⊆ c0)
  bitri(hs0[`' ⊊]hs1, hs1 ⊊ hs0, hs1[⊊]hs0)
  brcnv(hs0, crpss, hs1)
  vex(hs1)
  brrpss(hs1, hs0)
  vex(hs0)
  selpw(hs1, c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(`' ⊊)
  diff.hs0.c(P(c0))
  diff.hs1.c(`' ⊊)
  diff.hs1.c(P(c0))
  diff.hs1.w(hs0 ⊆ c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
}

blocks.name: sshepw
blocks.content: The relation between sets and their subsets is hereditary in the powerclass of any class. (Contributed by RP, 28-Mar-2020.)
